verses.verse: And <WG2532> after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> I saw<WG1492> four<WG5064> angels<WG32> standing<WG2476> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> corners<WG1137> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> holding<WG2902> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> winds<WG417> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> that<WG2443> the wind<WG417> should not<WG3361> blow<WG4154> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> any<WG3956> tree.<WG1186>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> angel<WG32> ascending<WG305> from<WG575> the east,<WG395> <WG2246> having<WG2192> the seal<WG4973> of the living<WG2198> God:<WG2316> and<WG2532> he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> to the<WG3588> four<WG5064> angels,<WG32> to whom<WG3739> it was given<WG1325> to<WG846> hurt<WG91> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281>

saying, <WG3004> Hurt<WG91> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> neither<WG3383> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> nor<WG3383> the<WG3588> trees,<WG1186> till<WG891> <WG3757> we have sealed<WG4972> the<WG3588> servants<WG1401> of our<WG2257> God<WG2316> in<WG1909> their<WG848> foreheads.<WG3359>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of them which were sealed:<WG4972> and there were sealed<WG4972> a hundred and forty and four thousand<WG1540> <WG5062> <WG5064> <WG5505> of<WG1537> all<WG3956> the tribes<WG5443> of the children<WG5207> of Israel.<WG2474>

Of <WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Judah<WG2455> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Reuben<WG4502> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Gad<WG1045> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of <WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Aser<WG768> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Naphtali<WG3508> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Manasses<WG3128> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of <WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Simeon<WG4826> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Levi<WG3017> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Issachar<WG2466> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of <WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Zebulun<WG2194> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Joseph<WG2501> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin<WG958> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

After <WG3326> this<WG5023> I beheld,<WG1492> and,<WG2532> lo,<WG2400> a great<WG4183> multitude,<WG3793> which<WG3739> no man<WG3762> could<WG1410> number,<WG705> <WG846> of<WG1537> all<WG3956> nations,<WG1484> and<WG2532> kindreds,<WG5443> and<WG2532> people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> tongues,<WG1100> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> Lamb,<WG721> clothed<WG4016> with white<WG3022> robes,<WG4749> and<WG2532> palms<WG5404> in<WG1722> their<WG848> hands;<WG5495>

And <WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying,<WG3004> Salvation<WG4991> to our<WG2257> God<WG2316> which sitteth<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> unto the<WG3588> Lamb.<WG721>

And <WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> angels<WG32> stood<WG2476> round about<WG2945> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> about the<WG3588> elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts,<WG2226> and<WG2532> fell<WG4098> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> on<WG1909> their<WG848> faces,<WG4383> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God,<WG2316>

saying, <WG3004> Amen:<WG281> Blessing,<WG2129> and<WG2532> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> wisdom,<WG4678> and<WG2532> thanksgiving,<WG2169> and<WG2532> honor,<WG5092> and<WG2532> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> might,<WG2479> be unto our<WG2257> God<WG2316> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>

And <WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> elders<WG4245> answered,<WG611> saying<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> What<WG5101> are<WG1526> these<WG3778> which are arrayed<WG4016> in white<WG3022> robes?<WG4749> and<WG2532> whence<WG4159> came<WG2064> they?

And <WG2532> I said<WG2046> unto him,<WG846> Sir,<WG2962> thou<WG4771> knowest.<WG1492> And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to me,<WG3427> These<WG3778> are<WG1526> they which came<WG2064> out of<WG1537> great<WG3173> tribulation,<WG2347> and<WG2532> have washed<WG4150> their<WG848> robes,<WG4749> and<WG2532> made them white<WG3021> <WG848> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of the<WG3588> Lamb.<WG721>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> are<WG1526> they before<WG1799> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> serve<WG3000> him<WG846> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night<WG3571> in<WG1722> his<WG848> temple:<WG3485> and<WG2532> he that sitteth<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> shall dwell<WG4637> among<WG1909> them.<WG846>

They shall hunger<WG3983> no<WG3756> more,<WG2089> neither<WG3761> thirst<WG1372> any more;<WG2089> neither<WG3761> <WG3361> shall the<WG3588> sun<WG2246> light<WG4098> on<WG1909> them,<WG846> nor<WG3761> any<WG3956> heat.<WG2738>

For <WG3754> the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> which<WG3588> is in<WG303> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> shall feed<WG4165> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> shall lead<WG3594> them<WG846> unto<WG1909> living<WG2198> fountains<WG4077> of waters:<WG5204> and<WG2532> God<WG2316> shall wipe away<WG1813> all<WG3956> tears<WG1144> from<WG575> their<WG848> eyes.<WG3788>
